title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 31 December 2013 - XWiki
content:
has joined #xwiki 00:53  has quit 01:49  has joined #xwiki 01:53  has quit 02:49  has joined #xwiki 02:51  has joined #xwiki 02:51  has quit 02:56  has quit 03:19  has joined #xwiki 03:21  has quit 03:22  has joined #xwiki 03:29  has quit 03:40  has quit 03:52  has joined #xwiki 03:57  has quit 04:00  has joined #xwiki 04:53  has joined #xwiki 04:56  has joined #xwiki 04:57  has quit 04:59  has quit 04:59  is now known as 05:54  has joined #xwiki 05:58  has quit 06:54  has joined #xwiki 06:59  has quit 07:55  has joined #xwiki 08:00  has quit 08:13  has joined #xwiki 08:56  has joined #xwiki 09:00  has quit 09:06  has joined #xwiki 09:46  has joined #xwiki 09:47  has joined #xwiki 09:47  has quit 10:09  has joined #xwiki 10:44  has joined #xwiki 10:45  has joined #xwiki 11:07  has joined #xwiki 11:37  has quit 11:37  has quit 11:37  has quit 11:40  has joined #xwiki 11:52  has joined #xwiki 11:52  has quit 11:53  has joined #xwiki 11:54  has quit 11:54  has joined #xwiki 11:59  good morning 12:00  seems I may have caused some issues yesterday when trying to fix the build 12:00  I see : http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-rest/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-rest/testReport/org.xwiki.test.rest/PageResourceTest/testGETNotExistingTranslation/ 12:00  16:26:50.418 [Thread-2] ERROR o.x.t.i.XWikiLogOutputStream - java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid locale format: NOT\_EXISTING 12:00  at org.xwiki.rest.XWikiResource.getDocumentInfo(XWikiResource.java:188) 12:00  looking into it 12:01  ok the issue is the test itself 12:02  well 12:02  not the test actually 12:02  but the test implies we need to handle non-valid translations 12:07  has joined #xwiki 12:10  has joined #xwiki 12:11  tmortagne: ping 12:13  has quit 12:19  forget it 12:19  I found a satisfactory solution 12:21  interesting error: 12:21  org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<<[p>This is content for a very small attachment.> but was:<<[div class="xwikirenderingerror">Failed to execute the [groovy] macro
java.lang.ClassFormatError: Invalid index 32877 in LocalVariableTable in class file org/codehaus/groovy/runtime/ArrayUtil  
12:21  (from http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-storage/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-storage/2946/testReport/junit/org.xwiki.test.storage/AttachmentTest/testDocumentAddAttachment/ )
